panels.title: Customer Count Evolution for Level Program: "$loyProgram" over $interval
Customer Daily Count for Level Program: "$loyProgram" and Level: $level
Customer Daily Count per Level for Level Program: "$loyProgram"

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.levelChangeType:$levelChangeType AND filter.previousLevel:$previousLevel AND filter.newLevel:$newLevel
filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.levelChangeType:$levelChangeType AND filter.previousLevel:$previousLevel AND filter.newLevel:$newLevel

panels.title: Customer Count for Level Program: "$loyProgram" and Level Change Type: "$levelChangeType" from $previousLevel to $newLevel

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND filter.levelChangeType:$levelChangeType AND filter.previousLevel:$previousLevel AND filter.newLevel:$newLevel

panels.title: Level Changes for Level Program: "$loyProgram" by Level Transition

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND (filter.levelChangeType:$downVar OR filter.levelChangeType:$upgradeVar) AND filter.previousLevel:$previousLevel AND filter.newLevel:$newLevel

panels.title: Upgrade and Downgrade Daily Count for Level Program: "$loyProgram" from $previousLevel to $newLevel

targets.query: filter.loyaltyProgram:$loyProgram AND (NOT(filter.levelChangeType:$downVar OR filter.levelChangeType:$upgradeVar)) AND filter.levelChangeType:$levelChangeType AND filter.previousLevel:$previousLevel AND filter.newLevel:$newLevel

panels.title: Opt-in and Opt-out Daily Count for Level Program: "$loyProgram" from $previousLevel to $newLevel
Score Summary by Level for Level Program: "$loyProgram"
